mapper.select:
select p.no as no, p.title as title, k.name as kind, u.nickname as nickname, p.hit as hit, p.recommend as recommend, p.level_no as level from problem p, user u, kind k where p.user_no = u.no and p.user_no = 10000 and p.kind_no = k.no and p.kind_no = 6
and (
p.level_no = 1 or
p.level_no = 2 or
p.level_no = 3 or
p.level_no = 4 or
p.level_no = 5 or
0=1)
